DOC.brief_summary: The present study assess effect type timing protein ingestion 6 day prior , 7 day follow eccentric exercise time course 1 ) recovery muscle function , 2 ) recovery perceive muscle soreness , 3 ) muscle metabolism .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Protein Ingestion Recovery Skeletal Muscle Function Following Eccentric Exercise .
DOC.criteria: Men woman generally healthy recreationally active Active cardiovascular disease hypertension Diagnosed metabolic impairment Use nutritional supplement Use antiinflammatory medication Habitual dietary protein intake < 0.8g/kg/day Musculoskeletal disorder
